snippet.title: Freedom Locomotion System Presentation
snippet.description:
A presentation of the Freedom Locomotion System and the Freedom Locomotion VR demo. Provides details on how all the various aspects of the Freedom Locomotion System works together to help create what is hopefully the most immersive VR locomotion system to date.

The demo is now available from:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/584170/
https://hugerobot.itch.io/freedom-locomotion-vr
